title: [mac] cannot copy-paste text on in-game chat
body: i play on mac computer and i cannot copy-paste text (like a flash cooldown) on in-game chat. cmd-a, cmd-c and cmd-v: none of these works on in-game chat. if i copy some text out of game (cmd-c), then go in game and try to paste it (cmd-v), the letter "v" will simply appear in chat.

replies.body:
You could never do this on windows either, it is to prevent spam.

If it worked on mac, that was a bug.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=RsLg1KIA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-03T02:57:52.210+0000)
>
> You could never do this on windows either, it is to prevent spam.
> 
> If it worked on mac, that was a bug.

i often see people copy-pasting the enemy flash cooldowns in chat for example (not just pinging the flash icon but actually copy-pasting text)
You cant ping or _see_ enemy cooldowns. They are just noting when it was cast and typing in the delay.

i know, they type the flash cooldown in chat, then they copy it and paste it (or spam it) in chat as a reminder whenever needed. ive seen bjergsen do this on stream many times.
